item.title: Hacking/OSCP cheatsheet
item.description: Hacking/OSCP Cheatsheet Well, just finished my 90 days journey of OSCP labs, so now here is my cheatsheet of it (and of hacking itself), I will be adding stuff in an incremental way as I go having time and/or learning new stuff. But this is basically the tools I tend to relie and use in this way the most. Hope is helpfull for you! Enumeration Network discoverie Nmap I tend to run 3 nmaps, an initial one, a full one and an UDP one, all of them in parallel:
